name: interstratify
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to add a layer in between other layers: Geologists say these rock beds are interstratified: layers of phosphorus-rich sediments alternate with other sediments. Layers of slate are interstratified between layers of sandstone. Related word
interstratification
More examplesFewer examplesThe rock consists of slate interstratified with small beds of blue limestone.The coal and slate are so interstratified that they can not be separated economically by machinery.It lies in slate, forming beds parallel to, and interstratified with, that rock.
